attributes.action: Pilots should be allowed to keep full length beards.
attributes.background: Many people are not able to persue their dream job of becoming a pilot due to the stupid restrictions of not being able to keep a full beard with airlines such as easyjet ectera. By signing this petition you will help to bring awareness to this problem and help people wanting to persue their dreams.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for individual airlines.
